p: Two articles [ 55, 56] disclosed the components of leaf EOs as limonene, α-pinene, β-pinene, dipentene, β-phellandrene, linalol, geraniol, menthol, tagetone, nonanal, linalyl acetate, camphene, sabinene, myrcene, ( Z)-β-ocimene, ( E)-β-ocimene, γ-terpinene, terpinolene, p-mentha-1,3,8-triene, terpinen-4-ol, p-cymen-9-ol, piperitone, thymol, indole, carvacrol, piperitenone, geranyl acetate, β-elemene, cyperene, β-caryophyllene, ( E)-β-farnesene, γ-muurolene, γ-elemene, and nerolidol.
